long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take your synthetic testing to new heights with Hotus. Streamline your testing workflow, identify critical issues, and deliver high-quality software with confidence. Download Hotus now and unlock the power of synthetic test recording within Chrome.

Hotus makes recording synthetic tests a breeze. With a simple click, initiate the recording session, and the extension will intelligently capture your interactions, including mouse clicks, keyboard inputs, and page navigations. Say goodbye to complex setup processes and start recording instantly.

Hotus is designed to be lightweight and non-intrusive, ensuring minimal impact on browser performance. The extension seamlessly integrates into your Chrome browser, providing a smooth and hassle-free testing experience.
